metadata.title: CVE-2019-13114 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
http.c in Exiv2 through 0.27.1 allows a malicious http server to cause adenial of service (crash due to a NULL pointer dereference) by returning acrafted response that lacks a space character.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4').
